Greater Masterwork: Weapon gains +2 attack and +1 damage; armor or shield gains -1 skill penalty, +1 maximum Dexterity bonus, and -5% arcane spell failure and can be donned or removed in half normal time; light shield may be used with a ranged weapon; other item gains +4 DC
Improved Masterwork: Weapon gains +1 attack and damage; armor or shield gains -1 skill penalty and +1 maximum Dexterity bonus; other item gains +2 DC
Reinforcing: Item gains +5 HP; a light weapon suffers -1 attack and a ranged weapon -2
Stonecunning: +2 Search (stone or metal), automatic check w/in 10'
Stoneworker: +2 Appraise (stone, metal)/+2 Craft (stone, metal)
Tempering (Fireforged): Item immune to fire; light/medium/heavy armor gives fire resistance 2/3/4
Tempering (Icebound): Item immune to cold; light/medium/heavy armor gives cold resistance 2/3/4
Tempering (Quick-Cooled): Increases item hardness by 40%; decreases item HP by half
Trapsmith-1: +2 Search (find traps)

Stability: +4 vs. Bull Rush and Trip
Tunnel Fighting: Suffers no penalty to AC or attack w/a one-handed weapon when squeezing
Vicious Assault: May make two claw attacks that inflict 1d6 each
